price: Ɛna (Onyankopͻn ahyε me sε menyε) ayεmyε ma me maame, na Wammͻ me (obi a meyε) ahomasoͻ anaa tibͻneni.
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَتِي وَلَمۡ يَجۡعَلۡنِي جَبَّارٗا شَقِيّٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidatī walam yajʿalnī jabbāran shaqiyyan
